org.apache.hadoop.hive.accumulo.serde

Class DefaultAccumuloRowIdFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.accumulo.serde.DefaultAccumuloRowIdFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccumuloRowIdFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeAccumuloRowIdFactory

    public class DefaultAccumuloRowIdFactory
extends Object
implements AccumuloRowIdFactory
    Default implementation of the AccumuloRowIdFactory which uses the normal AccumuloRowSerializer methods to serialize the field for storage into Accumulo.
